profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.6 Character encodings - cmaps for non-symbolic TrueType fonts
profile.description: For all non-symbolic TrueType fonts used for rendering, the embedded TrueType font program shall contain one or several non-symbolic cmap entries such that all necessary glyph lookups can be carried out.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: For all non-symbolic TrueType fonts used for rendering, the embedded TrueType font program shall contain one or several non-symbolic cmap entries such that all necessary glyph lookups can be carried out.
